data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Saint Symphorien have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 6, An attacking Metz player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A massive blow for Metz as Opa Nguette misses from the spot.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Willy Delajod signals a Metz throw-in in Dijon's half.
Metz to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Metz in the half of Dijon.
Goal! Mama Balde gives Dijon a 0-1 lead in Metz.
Mounir Chouiar with an assist there.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Metz.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Pape Ndiaga Yade equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 21, Great play from Lamine Gueye to set up the goal.
Dijon's Mama Balde misses with an attempt on goal.
Metz have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Dijon in Metz.
In the minute 29, Dijon have been given a penalty at Stade Saint Symphorien...
Mounir Chouiar (Dijon) has missed a penalty!
Willy Delajod awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Dijon advance rapidly upfield but Willy Delajod blows for offside.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
John Boye's header is off-target for Metz.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Mounir Chouiar for Dijon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Metz in the half of Dijon.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick Metz.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Willy Delajod awards Dijon a goal kick.
Willy Delajod blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Metz.
Dijon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Metz.
Metz are coming forward and Mamadou Fofana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 50, Dijon have a goal kick.
Willy Delajod signals a Dijon throw-in in Metz's half.
Throw-in Metz.
In the minute 51, Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
Metz's Thomas Delaine gets in a shot on goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stade Saint Symphorien, Metz are penalized for being offside.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 56, Willy Delajod signals a throw-in for Metz, close to Dijon's area.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Bersant Celina for Dijon drives towards goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Dijon.
Dijon drives forward and Mounir Chouiar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
In the minute 60, In Metz, Mama Balde (Dijon) misses the target with a header.
Willy Delajod awards Metz a goal kick.
Frederic Antonetti is making the team's first substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Vagner replacing Pape Ndiaga Yade.
In the minute 60, Aaron Leya Iseka is replacing Opa Nguette for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Free kick in a good position for Metz!
Metz are pushing forward but Farid Boulaya's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
The away team replace Roger Assale with Moussa Konate.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 64, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vagner (Metz) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Aaron Leya Iseka of Metz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 68, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Chafik with Ngonda Muzinga. This is the second substitution made today by David Linares.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Free kick Dijon.
Metz needs to be cautious. Dijon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
Corner awarded to Dijon.
In the minute 76, Metz have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Vagner of Metz gets in a strike, but is off target.
Dijon have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Metz make their third substitution with Thierry Ambrose replacing Lamine Gueye.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 79, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabien Centtonze of Metz gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
In the minute 82, In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dijon's Moussa Konate fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 83, Dijon are coming forward and Mounir Chouiar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Willy Delajod awards Metz a goal kick.
David Linares (Dijon) is making a third substitution, with Pape Diop replacing Mama Balde.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Thierry Ambrose for Metz drives towards goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Dijon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Metz to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
That's full-time at Stade Saint Symphorien. The final score is 1-1.
Thomas Delaine for Metz has been booked by Willy Delajod and receives a first yellow card.
Dijon's Mounir Chouiar has been booked in Metz.
